MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ST7 postcode area of Stoke On Trent , affecting properties in Talke Road and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:44am. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:44am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 08:53am on the 14th April 2021.
